hero.title: 1001 Stories,
hero.subtitle: Empowering Communities through Storytelling
hero.description: A global citizenship platform for young learners, brining stories from under-resourced communities to the world

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: Seeds of Empowerment and the 1001 Stories Project

soe.title: Seeds of Empowerment
soe.description: SOE is a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering underserved communities through education, storytelling, and technology. By supporting grassroots projects round the world, they help amplify local voices and foster sustainable development.

project.title: 1001 Stories Project
project.description: Our mobile storytelling program, 1001 Stories, brings meaningful learning to some of the hardest to reach populations around the world. We aim to facilitate the creation, development, and gathering of 1001 empowering stories from every participating local community.

benefit1.title: Promote Global Citizenship and Literacy
benefit1.description: Through storytelling and cultural exchange, 1001 Stories fosters global citizenship education, helping children around the world develop reading and writing skills.

benefit2.title: Empower Young Learners Everywhere
benefit2.description: We raise awareness about diverse experiences and support children's dreams by offering scholarships and creating accessible educational opportunities.

benefit3.title: Integrate AI and Personalized Learning
benefit3.description: By combining storybooks with AI-powered tools, 1001 Stories offers personalized learning experiences tailored to each student's journey.

features.title: Our Features
features.subtitle: More exciting features are on the way. Stay tuned!

library.title: üìñ Browse the 1001 Stories Library
library.description: Discover stories written by young authors around the world. Explore different cultures, perspectives, and dreams through storytelling.

write.title: üìù Write Your Story
write.description: Share your voice with the world! Write and submit your own story, inspire others, and become part of our global library.

bookclub.title: üìö Join a Book Club (Coming Soon)
bookclub.description: Find and join book clubs that match your interests. Read together, discuss ideas, and connect with young storytellers across the globe.

goals.title: üéØ Set and Track Your Goals (Coming Soon)
goals.description: Start with a quick assessment to personalize your journey. Set learning goals based on your interests and track your progress as you grow.

sofia.quote: Before 1001 Stories, I was too shy to share my writing. Now, my story is published for everyone to read! I feel like my voice matters, and I want to write even more
sofia.name: Sofia, Student (10)

ayaan.quote: I love reading stories from kids in other countries. It feels like I'm making new friends from around the world. 1001 Stories makes learning so much fun!
ayaan.name: Ayaan, Student (11)

emilyMom.quote: 1001 Stories gave my daughter the confidence to express herself creatively. Watching her set goals, complete her first story, and proudly share it was an unforgettable moment for our family
emilyMom.name: Emily's Mom

davidDad.quote: As a parent, I wanted something educational but also inspiring. 1001 Stories struck the perfect balance‚Äîhelping my son develop literacy skills while encouraging him to think globally and dream big.
davidDad.name: David's Dad

footer.tagline: Empowering young voices and inspiring the world through stories.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions about our platform? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to learn more about joining our global storytelling community.

placeholder.subject: Select a topic
placeholder.message: Tell us how we can help you...

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

secure.title: Secure by Design
secure.description: We protect your data with industry-standard encryption.

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.description: We're clear about what data we collect and why.

control.title: Your Control
control.description: You can access, update, or delete your data anytime.

noSell.title: We Never Sell Your Data
noSell.description: Your personal information is never sold to third parties. Period.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: These terms govern your use of the 1001 Stories platform. Please read them carefully before using our services.

canDo.title: You Can:
canDo.item1: Use the platform for educational purposes

cannotDo.title: You Cannot:
cannotDo.item1: Use the platform for commercial purposes
cannotDo.item4: Attempt to hack or disrupt the platform

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.minorsWarning: For Minors: If you are under 18, your parent or guardian must agree to these terms on your behalf before you can use the platform.

help.title: Help Center
help.description: Find answers to common questions, explore our guides, and get the support you need to make the most of 1001 Stories.

newUser.title: New User Guide
newUser.description: Learn how to create your account, choose your role, and start exploring stories.

educators.title: For Educators
educators.description: Discover how to create classes, assign stories, and track student progress.

technical.title: Technical Help
technical.description: Troubleshoot common issues and learn about platform features.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click the "Sign Up" button and choose your role (Student, Teacher, Writer, etc.). Fill out the required information and verify your email address.
createAccount.tip: Choose your role carefully as it determines what features you'll have access to.

userRoles.question: What are the different user roles?

isFree.question: Is 1001 Stories free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes! 1001 Stories is a non-profit platform and free for educational use.

support.title: Still Need Help?
support.description: Our support team is here to help. Reach out and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

firstStory.name: First Story
firstStory.description: Submit your first story to the platform
